PrerequisitesÂ¶

All you need to use Blow are:

  • Java SE or SDK, version 6 or higher, installed your machine.
  • The Amazon AWS Access Key ID and the Secret Access Key. These are available in the Security Credentials page of your Amazon AWS account.

Attention

Currently Blow has been tested only on Linux and Mac OSX, systems. You may expect some problems using different operating systems.
